content: the arrow ear warmer is a cozy unisex accessory overloaded with unique texture raised arrows cover every inch of this stash busting project making it modern and beautiful from every angle and since it s created with bulky weight yarn it works up crazy fast and is super-duper squishy and if you re nervous about the front post stitches don t be the pattern offers easy to follow row by row instructions a stitch chart and a video tutorial difficulty easy gauge 12 scs x 10 row = 4 materials hook 6 mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge yarn bulky size 5 charisma by loops & threads yardage preemie 30 yds baby 45 yds toddler 55 yds child 58 yds woman 62 yds man 70 yds notions tape measure threading needle scissors cyc average head sizes preemie 9-12 baby 14-16 toddler 16-18 child 18-20 woman 21-23 man 22-24 language english crochet terms us
